title: Computer crashes right when I enter a match
body: My computer runs every other game just fine, except for league. Right as soon as I load into the match my computer completely freezes and I have to hold the power button to turn it off. I reinstalled the game and have the same issue. Help?

replies.body:
I had the same problem.

right click league icon

select test compatibility

run diagnostic

save settings


voila!

Sounds like the Xbox Game bar is at it again! The recent Windows 10 Anniversary update enabled a feature inside the Game Bar called Game DVR. Unfortunately, this can cause system freezes shortly after loading into League. I recommend [disabling the bar entirely](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it resolves this for you.

Let me know if this helped.
